title: Additivity check failed in TreeExplainer
body:
Updated to shap 0.32.1 from 0.30 and now with the exact same code I get this error:

Additivity check failed in TreeExplainer! Please report this on GitHub.

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AssertionError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-20-9bd530204955> in <module>
     35     explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(model)
---> 36     shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X)
     37     shap_df = pd.DataFrame(shap_values, columns=X.columns)

~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\shap\explainers\tree.py in shap_values(self, X, y, tree_limit, approximate, check_additivity)
    215 
    216                 if check_additivity and model_output_vals is not None:
--> 217                     self.assert_additivity(out, model_output_vals)
    218 
    219                 return out

~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\shap\explainers\tree.py in assert_additivity(self, phi, model_output)
    392                 assert np.max(np.abs(self.expected_value[i] + phi[i].sum(-1) - model_output[:,i])) < 1e-3, err_msg
    393         else:
--> 394             assert np.max(np.abs(self.expected_value + phi.sum(-1) - model_output)) < 1e-3, err_msg
    395 
    396 

AssertionError: Additivity check failed in TreeExplainer! Please report this on GitHub. Consider retrying with the feature_dependence='independent' option.
```
